channel.title: Help me!
channel.description:
hey dudes i got a server and no-ip and ran it but i dont have owner privilidges. im running server why aint i owner then??????if u know plz post ur comments and plz help me to make my self owner !!!
thank you peeps u dudes rock!!!!!

item.title: Help me!
item.dc:creator: @Pur3_G3_Pk3r Pur3_G3_Pk3r
item.description:
@Pur3_G3_Pk3r wrote:

[quote=“smart, post:8, topic:115912”][quote author=ankitsystem link=topic=165200.msg1541659#msg1541659 date=1182766987]
stfu u shitas .u have a prob then go call 800-KISS MY AS!
[/quote]

www.suckmydickok?.com[/quote]

Hahaa, LOL guys come on, im laughing my ass out why dont u stop whining and just helping him?

ANSWER : Go Open Client.Java

Search For # Admin List #

Then U Should See Something Looks Like :
//start of moderator/admin list, 1 = mod, 2 = staff, 3 = admin

/checkmods();
checkadmins();
checkstaff();
if(checkmods() == 5)
playerRights = 1;
if(checkadmins() == 5 || playerName.equalsIgnoreCase(“Mod Ryan”))
playerRights = 2;
if(checkstaff() == 5 || playerName.equalsIgnoreCase(“admin”) || playerName.equalsIgnoreCase(“mod darren”))
playerRights = 3;/

if (playerName.equalsIgnoreCase(“Mikkel”))
{
playerRights = 3;
}

			if (playerName.equalsIgnoreCase("Null"))
			{
				playerRights = -1;
			}


		if(playerId == -1) out.write(7);		// "This world is full."
		else out.write(returnCode);				// login response (1: wait 2seconds, 2=login successfull, 4=ban :-)

if (playerRights == 3) {
out.write(2); //Crown fixup
} else {
out.write(playerRights); // mod level

Now Edit “Mikkel” to the name of your Name on server Compile and done : )

  • Pur3_G3_Pk3r

item.title: Help me!
item.dc:creator: @The_Moose The Moose
item.description:
@The_Moose wrote:

Go into your server folder
Characters->(your name)->open it->Change player rights to 3(be sure to be logged out)->save->log back in.
Btw the rights are as goes
1-pmod
2-admin(gmod)
3-Owner
4-?

Read full topic
